params._marketOfferId: id of the sale Emits a {} event if follows IERC721 or {} event if it follows IERC1155

buySale(uint256).details: fees SHOULD be automatically soustracted and made offer MUST be refunded if present

params._marketOfferId: id of the sale Emits a {offerCanceled} event

params._contractAddress: the address of the NFT's contract
params._tokenId: id of the token within its collection

params._duration: duration of the offer  emits a {} even

params._newPrice: the new price of the sale

params.ids: an array of all the ids of the tokens within their collection/type
params.operator: address allowed to transfer NFTs on owner's behalf
params.values: quantity of each received. Use case for Semi Fungible Tokens

params.id: the id of the NFT within its collection
params.operator: address allowed to transfer NFTs on owner's behalf
params.value: quantity received. Use case for Semi Fungible Tokens

params.operator: address allowed to transfer NFTs on owner's behalf
params.tokenId: id of the NFT within its collection

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._fees: the fee the marketplace will receive from each sale

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

WETH().notice: percentage of the fee. starts at 0, cannot be more than 10

acceptOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: a third party made an offer below the asked price and seller accepts

buySale(uint256).notice: allows anyone to buy instantly a NFT at asked price.

cancelSale(uint256).notice: cancel a sale. Will refund last offer made

createSale(address,uint256,uint256).notice: opens a new sale of a single NFT. Supports {ERC721} and {ERC1155}. Compatible with {ERC721A}

getEthFees().notice: get all fees in ETH collected

getSaleOrder(uint256).notice: get all informations of a sale order by calling its id

getWEthFees().notice: get all fees in WETH collected

makeOffer(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: make an offer. Offer is made and sent in WETH.

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.notice: MUST be implemented to be compatible with all ERC1155 standards NFTs batch transfers

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.notice: MUST be implemented to be compatible with all ERC1155 standards NFTs single transfers

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: MUST be implemented to be compatible with all ERC721 standards NFTs

setFees(uint256).notice: set the fees. CANNOT be negative or more than 10%

unlockNFT(address,uint256,address).notice: security function to allow marketplace to send NFT.

withdrawEth().notice: allow a user to withdraw its balance if ETH was sent

withdrawEthFees().notice: withdraw all gains in ETH made from the sales fees all at once.

withdrawWETHFees().notice: withdraw all gains made in WETH from the sales fees all at once.
